thread.title: Palestinian stabs 3 policemen in Jerusalem
thread.title_full: Palestinian stabs 3 policemen in Jerusalem - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Palestinian stabs 3 policemen in Jerusalem
text:
JERUSALEM: Police say a Palestinian attacker stabbed three police officers in Jerusalem before being shot dead.
Police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said Saturday afternoon's attack took place just outside the Old City. One of the officers was seriously wounded, while the other two were moderately wounded. Rosenfeld says other police forces opened fire and killed the attacker.
Earlier in the day, in a nearby location, a Palestinian teenager stabbed two Israelis before being shot dead by police.
Recent days have seen a wave of Palestinian stabbing attacks against civilians and soldiers in Israel and the West Bank. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
